text: a l laoh chea anak del ban bangkeut puok anak mk pi mnoussa temuoyokt( a da) haey a l laoh ban bangkeut chenhpi keat nouv phriyea robsa keat( ha vea) daembi aoy keat mean pheap rikreay rsanow chea muoy neang . nowpel keat ban ruomphet cheamuoy neang neang ka meanophtai poh da sral haey neang b nd pr poh noh . nowpel phtaipoh noh mean pheap thngon ke teangpir kaban buongsuong som pi a l laoh del chea mcheasa robsa puokke teangpir tha pitabrakd nasa brasenbae trongbratan aoy puok yeung nouv kaun da la mneak noh puok yeung pitchea nung klaytowchea anak del sthet knongchamnaom anak del doengkoun
